anuradhapura yugayata ayath sithuwamwala daknata labena rathu warna "kunu le warnayata" huru thada warnayak bawath mahanuwara yugaye sadalingam muladrawya yodaganimin sada gath rathu warnaya etharam thada warnayak nowana bawath pawasana jayasinha nayide mahatha anuradhapura yugayata ayath sigiriya, dimbaulagala, nayidenawa yana sthanawala sithuwamwala daknata labena rathu warnaya rahasigatha puskola pothe adangu deshiya amudrawya 15k yoda ganimin kala paryeshanayedi nipadawa ganimata samath wu baw hethema pawasiya.
